content: to the side of the body so it curls around for the sixth single_crochet stitch pick up one loop of the tail on your hook first and then complete the single_crochet like normal working through the body stitch and the one loop from the tail single_crochet 12 18 stitches row 5 notes - as the tail is in first stitch in row 5 we put the first single_crochet in the slip_stitch space beside the tail - to complete the second single_crochet of the row bend the tail towards you so that it points to the outside of the work - don t straighten the tail leave a few curls in it before securing to the body it is your choice which stitch you pick up along the tail i usually use one in the middle say stitch 11 but it isn t necessary to count 😊 row 4 alternative row 4 & 5 shorter tail & not hooked to the side we complete the tail and the paws see note above in this row slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 14 single_crochet back up the chain to the beginning and slip_stitch into the same stitch where you started tail made blo single_crochet 6 blo 1 puff first paw blo single_crochet 2 blo 1 puff second paw blo single_crochet 7 18 stitches press on the inside of the puff stitches so they puff outwards summary of row 4 tail single_crochet 6 paw single_crochet 2 paw single_crochet 7 = 18 stitches row 5 single_crochet 18 18 stitches for the first stitch in row 5 put the first single_crochet in the slip_stitch beside the tail to complete the second single_crochet of the row bend the tail towards you so that it points to the outside of the work row 6 - 8 single_crochet 18 18 stitches row 9 *decrease single_crochet 1* repeat around 12 stitches row 10 *decrease single_crochet 4* repeat around 10 stitches criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-kitty-cat row 11 *increase single_crochet 4* repeat around 12 stitches row 12 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 1* repeat around 18 stitches row 13-15 single_crochet 18 18 stitches face put your eyes in now use the two front feet to help with identifying the middle sew a face on the cat you can have whiskers nose mouth cheeks eyebrows etc stuff stuff the cat with light to medium stuffing try not to stuff too firmly at the bottom or the cat won t sit flat row 16 i like to complete the cats ears across the top from the front to do this you will need to single_crochet around 8-9 more times half a row to get to the other corner for the first ear squish the two sides of head together so you have a straight line making sure your face is in the middle working through both sides of the work 4 loops complete the following in the first stitch *single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet* now slip_stitch over all of the middle stitches excluding
